Use a wallet as a phone stand: Fold your wallet in half and prop your phone up on it to watch videos or take photos.
Use a wallet as a portable phone charger: Keep a portable phone charger in your wallet to keep your phone charged on the go.
Use a wallet as a DIY flashlight: Attach a small flashlight to your wallet and use it as a portable source of light.
Use a wallet as a miniature garden: Fill a small pocket of your wallet with soil and plant some small plants to create a miniature garden.
Use a wallet as a portable art kit: Keep a small paintbrush, a few paint colors, and a small canvas in a separate compartment of your wallet to create art on the go.
